snippet: Peter Gromoff, an Eastern Orthodox priest, lost one of his feet, and part of the other, to complications from diabetes.
abstract: Metropolitan Council on Jewish Poverty, a beneficiary of UJA-Federation of New York, secures a grant for eastern Orthodox priest Peter Gromoff, who lost one of his feet, and part of the other, to complications from diabetes and also struggles with complications from HIV.
lead_paragraph: Peter Gromoff, an Eastern Orthodox priest, lost one of his feet, and part of the other, to complications from diabetes.

headline.seo: An Eastern Orthodox Priest Is Hobbled by Diabetes
headline.main: H.I.V. Led to Stigmatization, Diabetes to the Loss of a Foot
headline.print_headline: H.I.V. Led to Stigmatization, Diabetes to the Loss of a Foot

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations
